shortdesc.ph: Sets the preset headphone equalizer effect.
Sets the preset headphone equalizer effect.

section.p: This method is mainly used in spatial audio scenarios. You can select a preset headphone equalizer to listen to the audio for the desired experience.
This method is mainly used in spatial audio scenarios. You can select a preset headphone equalizer to listen to audio and achieve the desired audio experience.
section.note: If your headphones already have a good equalizer, calling this method may not significantly improve the experience and could even degrade it.
If your headphones already have good equalization, calling this method may not provide a noticeable improvement and may even reduce the experience.

plentry.pd:
Preset headphone equalizer effect:
HEADPHONE_EQUALIZER_OFF: Disable headphone equalizer and hear the original audio.
HEADPHONE_EQUALIZER_OVEREAR: Use equalizer for over-ear headphones.
HEADPHONE_EQUALIZER_INEAR: Use equalizer for in-ear headphones.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-1: A general error occurred (no specific reason).

< 0: Failure.
-1: A general error occurred (no specific reason).
